attributes.action: recognise the service and loyalty of the Gurka contingent of the British Army.  We, the British people consider the Gurka people who served and serve in the British army as worthy of British citizenship and call upon the Government to grant this citizenship as a matter of right, whenever it is requested.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
